forum.content:
We don't talk anymore like we used to do.

一首不斷在腦海盤旋的旋律，
簡單的配樂，簡單的歌詞，
道出不簡單的心情。

urls.description:
Charlie Puth’s debut album Nine Track Mind is available now!

Download: http://smarturl.it/NineTrack
urls.title: Charlie Puth - We Don't Talk Anymore [Official Audio]

forum.title: We don't talk anymore
